settings.heading_text: HyperX is the official peripheral partner for Call of Duty®
settings.desc: In a world where the ultimate weapon is your team, tight communication and pinpoint execution is critical. HyperX is the official peripheral partner for Call of Duty® because we make the gear your squad needs to succeed.
HyperX has three new branded in-game items for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone! An animated player card, an animated emblem, and a weapon vinyl.

settings.title: Digital Offer
settings.description_col_1:
Receive the three HyperX in-game items for Call of Duty with orders over £30!*

Each code grants access to
all three in-game HyperX items.
Items can be used in Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® III and Call of Duty®:
Warzone™*.
Codes are not platform specific, so can be used by every gamer.

*Items will be available in Call of Duty: Warzone from December 6, 2023.

settings.heading_text: The Command Center: Your Ultimate Hub for All Things Call of Duty®
settings.subtitle: Your Ultimate Hub for All Things Call of Duty®

settings.subtitle_text: Up to 120 Hours of uninterrupted Gameplay
settings.desc: With a battery life of up to 120 hours*, you'll never be interrupted during gripping PvP combat or marathon streams. A lifetime activation of DTS Spatial Audio will amp up your audio advantage with its precise sound localisation - Crucial for dominating your opponents during open combat missions.

settings.subtitle_text: Your Tactical Advantage for Outstanding Style & Sound
settings.desc: Boasting a sleek design, a discreet shock mount, and an understated RGB glow, the DuoCast USB Microphone is ideal for immersing yourself in combat & cinematic Call of Duty® campaign missions. The low-profile shock mount not only enhances the microphone's minimalist design, but also absorbs vibrations, ensuring uninterrupted in-game communication.

settings.title: Explore Additional Loadout Options
settings.subtitle: Whether you’re battling on PC, console, or mobile, HyperX gear can help you enhance your Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone experience.

settings.video_desc: Check out the Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III Reveal Trailer

settings.footnote:
Terms & Conditions of the promotion

* Only valid for orders of £30 or more through uk.hyperx.com . You will receive the code on the email address you provided on your order.

You must accept marketing upon checking out when placing your order to receive the email with the in-game code.

The promotion starts on 10/11/2023 at 11.00 GMT and the promotion ends on 10/02/2024 at 23.59 GMT

Redemption of this code requires you to have a Call of Duty/Activision account and be logged in to that account. Visit callofduty.com/redeem
to sign in or register for an Activision account if you do not already have one and redeem your code*.

Participants will also have to link their Activision account with their PlayStation account, Xbox Live account, Battle.net account, or Steam account.

One (1) code is awarded per email/account used, while stock lasts, per qualifying HyperX product purchased during the promotion period. Each code is valid for one-time use.

Code redemption is valid from November 10, 2023 through September 1, 2024.

*Items will be available in Call of Duty: Warzone from December 6, 2023.

The HyperX in-game items do not have a retail value and cannot be exchanged for cash.

Internet connection required. Game sold/downloaded separately. Online multiplayer subscription may be required, sold separately.

©️ 2023 Activision Publishing, Inc. ACTIVISION, CALL OF DUTY, and MODERN WARFARE are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc.

* Rewards may take up to 24 hours to appear in game. Please visit support.activision.com for troubleshooting tips.
